"No, I didn't do anything," Naruto casually said. "You were just about to let me rub your naked tits when you blanked out."

Tsunade looked confused for a while, but then started removing her shirt as she said, "You're right. I'm sorry, Lord Hokage; I guess my mind's somewhere else." As soon as she finished the sentence, she removed the shirt, revealing that she didn't wear a bra over her massive breasts. "Please be gentle, Lord Hokage; they're very sensitive."

Naruto eagerly took Tsunade's boobs and started rubbing them, causing Tsunade to moan at the contact. He then said, "You know, there is another reason you wanted me down here."

"There is?" Tsunade asked between moans.

"Yeah; you wanted to help me capture Hinata and make her my slave. You wanted to have a sister slave."

Tsunade immediately "remembered" her asking to be a part of Naruto's enslavement of Hinata. She had wanted to serve Naruto alongside someone else, and thought Hinata was the perfect candidate.

"Oh...of course, Lord Hokage..." Tsunade moaned out as her breathing got heavier.

Naruto then remove his hands and said, "We can finish if you want, but only when we've captured Hinata."

Although disappointed at the loss of contact, Tsunade smiled and said, "Very well, Lord Hokage." She then slipped her shirt on and said, "Where should we start?"

"Well, first, make a Shadow Clone to take your place as Hokage so no one gets suspicious when you aren't there."

"Yes, Lord Hokage," Tsunade said as she created the clone. When the clone left, Naruto whispered into Tsunade's ear, "Okay, here's what you need to do."

132331.content:
Naruto eventually found Hinata walking toward the shopping district with Tenten. He grinned, then approached the two girls with a henged Tsunade behind him. She had made herself look much younger, around 8 or 9, and had put a regular playing card on her ear, as per Naruto's instructions.

"Hey, Hinata; hey, Tenten!" Naruto called out, causing the two girls to turn his way. While Tenten waved at him, Hinata blushed and sank into Tenten's shadow.

"Hi, Naruto! Who's your friend, and what's with the wacky hat?" Tenten asked.

"Hey, that's rude!" Tsunade yelled. "That hat makes him look classy, and besides, it was my Daddy's!"

"I'm sorry," Hinata said on Tenten's behalf. She then asked, "Um, N...Naruto, why are you..."

"I got stuck with babysitting her today, and she insisted I wear this hat," Naruto lied.

"Hey, you two wanna play a game?" Tsunade asked.

Feeling guilty about making the girl feel bad before, Tenten said, "Sure."

"Great!" Tsunade cheerfully said. She gave Hinata and Tenten a card and said, "Place the cards on your ear without looking at the face!"

"Why?" Hinata politely asked.

"I've heard you can hear what card it is if you put it on your ear," Tsunade lied.

Tenten and Hinata shrugged before putting the cards on their ears. As soon as they were in place, the girls' eyes grew glassy and they stood still. Naruto approached them and asked, "Hinata, Tenten, can you hear me?"

"Yes, Naruto-sama, we hear and obey," both girls answered in monotoned unison.

"Yes! It worked!!" Naruto cheered.

"I'm so happy for you, Lord Hokage!" Tsunade said as she hugged Naruto.

Naruto grinned, then said, "Hinata, Tenten, follow us to my apartment."

"Yes, Naruto-sama," Hinata and Tenten blankly said as they jumped on the rooftops until they stood in the living room of Naruto's apartment.

Tsunade then dropped her little girl disguise and asked, "What are we going to do now, Lord Hokage?"

"Just watch," Naruto said as he channeled his chakra in the cards in Hinata and Tenten's ears. "Hinata and Tenten, from now on, you will obey me without question and believe everything I say."

"...yes, Naruto-sama..."

Naruto then thought about individual quirks he wanted to give Hinata and Tenten. In the end, he settled on...

1: Hinata becomes obsessed with cosplay and is more outgoing while Tenten is always trying to have sex with the others.

2: Hinata doesn't like to wear any clothes when she's around Naruto, Tenten and Tsunade while Tenten prefers to wear men's clothes while in their presence.

142.content:
Naruto left Tsunade and started to walk around town. He wanted to find out more about the strange hypnotic cards. After a while he passed The flower shop that Ino worked in. Ino was a smart girl ( if not a bit bitchy at times) so Naruto figured that she could probably help him.

Entering the flower shop, Naruto was met with the sight of several long green plants hanging from the roof and walls as well as on the tables and shelves making it look more like a botanic garden then a shop. In the middle of it all was Ino dusting of a big Greek statue of a naked muscular man.

"Hey" Naruto said the minute he opened the door. Ino, having been working the entire day, was annoyed beyond belief at the sound of that kid Naruto's voice.

"Whats up with all the green in here?" Naruto said not noticing the uninviting look Ino was giving him.

"Mom made me buy all these plants just because she thought they matched this stupid statue she won in a lottery." Ino said now using a piece of cloth to polish the right arm of the statue.

I think it looks pretty cool. I was just cleaning the hokage tower and you won't believe what I found." Naruto said as he searched his pockets for a card.

Ino let out an aggressive sigh and turned back to Naruto. "Look, im not intrested in you or your stupid cards! You're being a pest and a bother and I have to finish cleaning." Ino said as she turned back to the statue and dusted it's muscular chest.
- -
" Don't be like that it's something really cool I promise." Naruto said feeling hurt from Ino's harsh words.
Ino decided to just ignore him and focus on cleaning. She moved to it's lower half and washed the belt area that seemed especially dirty.
Naruto walked over to a chair and sat down to Ino's continued annoyance.

"I found these cards and hoped you could help me figure out how they worked."

"Mhm really interesting," Ino said. She couldn't for the life of her get the statue's hrmph, "thing" clean and dropped the piece of cloth, instead spitting in her hand and trying to rub the dirty spots of it.

"First I thought that it was some random old deck, but then I noticed this note that...."

" Does this this story have a point," Ino cut Naruto of still concentrating on cleaning, now using both hands to stroke the man's sausage.

" Well it turns out that the cards have hypnotic powers that can control people through chacra."

" Thwate twe "slurp" stupidest thing iv'e "lick" ever heard," Ino said after licking the shaft of the giant statue and turning to Naruto giving him a " are you retarded" type of look. For then to continue washing the statue with her mouth.

"It's true," Naruto said defensively.

"Shwuwh ihf ihs," Ino muffeled out trying to deep through the dick clean.

" What if I told you Iv'e already used them on you."

" Thwaawph rephic "slurp" Thats ridiculous!" Ino said as she let go of the man's length and started to climb on top of the statue.

"Just think about it, isn't what your doing now weird."

Don't think so, no, Ino said getting bored of the conversation. She removed her panties from underneath her skirt and placed them over her head like a mask.

" Tell me, what exactly are you doing now" Naruto asked, one hand down his pants without Ino seeming to care.

"I'm about to clean this statues phallus using my pussy. Something that would be alot easier without you talking," Ino said she positioned herself in a crouching position over the cook, legs spread giving Naruto a great view of her shaven cunt.

" And you sure you want to do that?"

"YEEES!!!!" Ino screamed as she lowered herself on to the penis and started to ride it like a horse.

Sakura just shook her head looking at him in a mix of disappointment and annoyance. "#1 No you wouldn't 2# Can you just leave already."
